title: doWhat method return value- describe behavior

content.question: Which of the following best describes the value, if any, returned from a call to  doWhat?

choices.label: The sum of all integers between  1  and  num,  inclusive
The sum of all even integers between  1  and  num,  inclusive
The sum of all odd integers between  1  and  num,  inclusive
No value is returned because of an infinite loop.

content.answer: The sum of all odd integers between  1  and  num,  inclusive

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
